name: Dynasty Taste
address: 539A E Tremont Ave, Bronx, NY 10457, USA

reviews.text: This is your typical Chinese takeout restaurant. No seats standing room only. It doesn't look the best. It could use some paint and remove the clutter to make it feel more inviting. Despite it's sketchy appearance the gentleman behind the counter is pleasant and helpful. They serve your typical Chinese American dishes however, they also offer Japanese style and Korean style of the popular dishes which adds to the variety. The food is tasty and the Korean style sauce is my favorite. All the dishes I had from here always tasted freshly cooked except the fries (hit or miss). I would definitely order from here again.

The chicken was dry and tasteless the spare rib was dry as well but what made it worst was the fact that this food gave me a crazy stomach ache and I know it was them cause all I had that day was this Chinese food I‚Äôm never buying here again
One of the best Chinese food places in the entire Bronx
The staff are so nice food is finger licking good,they gave me free cookies too.

Best in the Bronx! The cook is a chef and has his own cuisine meals aside from all the ones you‚Äôre already used to. Try the Korean chicken with the Korean sauce (you‚Äôll remember this post), I have mine with vegetable fried rice. Kenny and his uncle are great people too, a blessing to have in the Bronx
Atmosphere was nothing to brag about, however, there were no complaints about it.
Found this place near my job. The food was delicious. The outside is not too appeasing however the food was great. They accept Apple Pay
Waste place no parking . Dirty place no high-geneüëé

Ordered something light. Sweet and sour chicken with Pork Fried rice. It was honestly the best around I‚Äôve ever had. Good chicken, tender pork. Really impressed. My new go to in the area. Dead a$$. Dude behind the counter was friendly and chill.

More like Dynasty Waste! I ordered the beef and broccoli dish and I received way more broccoli than beef. See the picture I posted...even under the few pieces of beef, there was even MORE brocolli underneath it. EVERYTHING tasted gross. Clearly they look at "special instructions" because they called back about upcharging $2 for the requested fried rice with this order. However, they IGNORED the directions to add scallions to my egg drop soup. The egg roll was clearly cooked in old, stale oil.
Love they lo mein and tso chicken
Food Is OK.
I never went in there  .

My first time trying Dynasty Taste.
I got the sesame chicken with fry rice.
The portion size is great and the rice and chicken were very good.
The chicken has a crunch too it and is not soggy which is great. I look forward to trying their other items in the future.
A+
Very nice and Good food
The food is great.
The chicken wings was so little and skimpy it only have bones no meat. The fried shrimp was fried with dirty oil you could just taste it in the batter . IM NEVER COMING HERE AGAIN ! NOT WORTH IT !
One of the best Chinese food restaurant in the Bronx

The sauce in my food was straight oil, soy sauce and chili pepper. So much oil the peppers and onions were soaked in it even though a bunch spilled out into the brown bag. Feel like I should of just got a hero from the corner store because I did not enjoy my meal.

UPDATE - I came back here for the first time in 5 months and it wasn‚Äôt as good as the first time. The chicken looked dry & nasty like it was refried multiple times & was black inside . The rice was still ok but I don‚Äôt think I will come here again.

Original-
My boyfriend ordered boneless spare rib tips with pork fried rice and chicken wings this afternoon for lunch . I was on the phone with him while he ordered the food and the employee he spoke to seemed nice. Everything was delicious. I usually put barbecue sauce on my rice but this rice wasn‚Äôt dry and didn‚Äôt need it . The chicken was crispy and perfectly seasoned. The spare rib tips weren‚Äôt tough and the barbecue sauce on it was so good. The only thing is they put vegetables in their rice so if that‚Äôs not your thing then ask for no vegetables.
I ORDER ONE OF THE MOST COMMON DISHES SHRIMP FRIED RICE AND CHICKEN WINGS. I HAD MAYBE 5 or 6 baby shrimps in the rice. I asked that the chicken wings be crispy. They seem to be old and dried out.
They fry pork in the same grease they fry the chicken wings in. Shame on you! That is very uncivilized in the American Food Industry.

Absolutely delicious! I've ordered from them twice and both times the food has been fresh and delicious. The long bone bbq spare ribs are to die for!!! They are cooked to perfection and the sauce is the best I've ever had! I also love their‚Ä¶

El lugar es muy peque√±o dentro pero est√° bien organizado y es higi√©nico. Todos los empleados ten√≠an guantes y mascarillas. Hay un dispensador de alcohol en la entrada.

The food was delicious and a very generous amount üëå the prices are reasonable due to the portions you receive. You can easily feed 2 adults off 1meal. I'm not sure if it's Chinese or Korean food yet myself, my spouse, adult son, and nephew who put me in give it 5 STARS easy!!! YUMMY‚Ä¶
Love them! Great people! Their jumbo shrimp and Korean fried chicken is fire! They always look out for the block and feed those who don‚Äôt got it. Reheated food or not. Still my favorite chino spot!

I go here ones in a blue every month or week. Love the food. People works there are nice and never nasty. Food great i never go to any chinese place other then this one. Thats the truth. Best chicken and tell u what they have or what they‚Ä¶
Delicious food! I especially enjoyed their shrimp and the customer service is amazing. I eat here often because I know they won't disappoint.
